net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO

Class AbstractByteReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.AbstractByteReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IByteReader, IByteRecordReader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseByteTextReader, FixedLengthByteReader, FujitsuVbByteReader, MicroFocusByteReader, TextReader, VbByteReader, VbsByteReader, ZOldBaseByteTextReader

    public abstract class AbstractByteReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements IByteReader
    This abstract class is the base class for all Byte~Reader classes
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
